thread.title: UMKC puts assistant at center of escort case on leave
thread.title_full: UMKC puts assistant at center of escort case on leave

title: UMKC puts assistant at center of escort case on leave
text:
UMKC places men's basketball assistant Andre McGee on leave after escort allegations THE ASSOCIATED PRESS   7:19   7:19   
Subjects: 
Missouri (724) 

KANSAS CITY, Missouri — Missouri-Kansas City has placed men's basketball assistant coach Andre McGee on paid administrative leave as it investigates allegations that he hired an escort to provide sex for recruits while at Louisville. 
A statement issued Friday evening said that it was aware of the allegations and said it had already initiated its own review. 
An upcoming book alleges that McGee hired an escort multiple times to provide strippers and prostitutes for recruits and players over a four-year period while on the Cardinals' staff. McGee left Louisville in 2014 to join UMKC.
